propDescriptions.classes: Override or extend the styles applied to the component. See CSS API below for more details.
propDescriptions.completed: Mark the step as completed. Is passed to child components.
propDescriptions.error: If true, the step is marked as failed.
propDescriptions.icon: The label displayed in the step icon.

active.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `active={true}`.

completed.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `completed={true}`.

error.description: Pseudo-class applied to the root element if `error={true}`.
